public class Tiles

Creates a new Tile.

Parameters:
inName - The name of the tile
sheetX - The image's X coordinate.
sheetY - The image's Y coordinate.
tileSetNum - The tileSet id.
inWorldX - The X coordinate in the world.
inWorldY - The Y coordinate in the world.
